mapper.select: select ab_id abId, ab_name abName, ab_email abEmail, ab_comdept abComdept, ab_birth abBirth, ab_tel abTel, ab_memo abMemo from addrbook
select ab_id abId, ab_name abName, ab_email abEmail, ab_comdept abComdept, ab_birth abBirth, ab_tel abTel, ab_memo abMemo from addrbook where ab_id = #{abId}
mapper.insert: insert into addrbook(ab_name, ab_email, ab_comdept, ab_birth, ab_tel, ab_memo) values(#{abName}, #{abEmail}, #{abComdept}, #{abBirth}, #{abTel}, #{abMemo})
mapper.update: update addrbook set ab_name = #{abName}, ab_email = #{abEmail}, ab_comdept = #{abComdept}, ab_birth = #{abBirth}, ab_tel = #{abTel}, ab_memo = #{abMemo} where ab_id = #{abId}
